com.agorapulse.slack.http

Class SlackAppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.slack.http.SlackAppController

  • @Controller(value="/slack")
public class SlackAppController
extends Object
    The default Web controller that works in Micronaut apps. This component requires singleton App instance managed by the Micronaut DI container.
    See Also:
    The official tutorial, @Controller annotation This is a copy of com.slack.api.bolt.micronaut.SlackAppController that guarantees compatibility with older versions of Micronaut.
